issue.title: Can't delete a Joomla user (on SQLSRV)
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Can't delete a Joomla user, even after have successfully deleted the linked easySDI account.

Always get the same message :

```

Erreur
Suppression de l'utilisateur impossible : un compte easySDI y est associé.
```


**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Is it deleted ? Or just in trash ?
(I had the "problem" once...)

**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

No, the problem occur after emptying trash.
